article: ep energy had its price objective lifted by equities research analysts at robert w. baird from $ 2.00 to $ 5.00 in a research note issued on tuesday . the firm presently has an `` outperform '' rating on the energy producer 's stock . robert w. baird 's price objective suggests a potential upside of 92.31 % from the company 's current price . epe has been the subject of a number of other reports . valuengine lowered ep energy from a `` sell '' rating to a `` strong sell '' rating in a report on friday , december 1st .

jefferies group reaffirmed an `` underperform '' rating and set a $ 1.00 price target on shares of ep energy in a report on tuesday , october 10th . stifel nicolaus set a $ 3.00 price target on ep energy and gave the stock a `` hold '' rating in a report on thursday , october 5th . tudor pickering downgraded ep energy from a `` buy '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a report on tuesday , september 5th . finally , zacks investment research downgraded ep energy from a `` strong-buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a report on wednesday , october 11th .

nine equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , seven have given a hold rating and one has issued a buy rating to the company 's stock . ep energy has an average rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of $ 3.63 . ep energy traded up $ 0.09 during trading hours on tuesday , reaching $ 2.60 . the company had a trading volume of 1,069,900 shares , compared to its average volume of 1,058,550 . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 641.81 , a price-to-earnings ratio of -2.45 and a beta of 4.45 .

ep energy has a 52-week low of $ 1.54 and a 52-week high of $ 6.88 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 8.01 , a quick ratio of 0.65 and a current ratio of 0.69 . ep energy last released its earnings results on wednesday , november 1st . the energy producer reported earnings per share for the quarter , beating the zacks ' consensus estimate of by $ 0.01 . the firm had revenue of $ 219.00 million during the quarter , compared to analyst estimates of $ 264.90 million . ep energy had a negative return on equity of 8.50 % and a negative net margin of 25.44 % .

during the same period last year , the business posted $ 0.10 earnings per share . equities analysts anticipate that ep energy will post -0.42 earnings per share for the current fiscal year . several institutional investors and hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of the company . rhumbline advisers increased its position in shares of ep energy by 0.6 % during the second quarter . rhumbline advisers now owns 58,536 shares of the energy producer 's stock worth $ 214,000 after purchasing an additional 375 shares in the last quarter . dimensional fund advisors lp increased its position in shares of ep energy by 0.4 % during the second quarter .

dimensional fund advisors lp now owns 809,282 shares of the energy producer 's stock worth $ 2,962,000 after purchasing an additional 2,919 shares in the last quarter . wells fargo & company mn increased its position in shares of ep energy by 11.7 % during the second quarter . wells fargo & company mn now owns 28,848 shares of the energy producer 's stock worth $ 106,000 after purchasing an additional 3,028 shares in the last quarter . parametric portfolio associates llc increased its position in shares of ep energy by 1.1 % during the second quarter . parametric portfolio associates llc now owns 817,432 shares of the energy producer 's stock worth $ 2,992,000 after purchasing an additional 8,690 shares in the last quarter .

finally , vanguard group inc. . increased its position in shares of ep energy by 0.3 % during the second quarter . vanguard group inc. . now owns 3,459,190 shares of the energy producer 's stock worth $ 12,660,000 after purchasing an additional 9,068 shares in the last quarter . institutional investors and hedge funds own 68.89 % of the company 's stock . copyright violation warning : `` ep energy pt raised to $ 5.00 '' was originally posted by daily political and is owned by of daily political . if you are accessing this news story on another website , it was illegally copied and republished in violation of us and international trademark and copyright legislation .

the legal version of this news story can be viewed at energy company profileep energy corporation is an independent exploration and production company . the company is engaged in the acquisition and development of unconventional onshore oil and natural gas properties in the united states . the company operates through a base of producing assets . it is involved in the development of its drilling inventory located in three areas : the eagle ford shale , the wolfcamp shale and the altamont field in the uinta basin .
